# loadFriendsObsoleted(completionHandler:)

**Instance Method**

Retrieves a list of player identifiers for the local player’s friends.

## Declaration

```swift
func loadFriendsObsoleted(completionHandler: (([String]?, (any Error)?) -> Void)? = nil)
```

```swift
func loadFriendsObsoleted() async throws -> [String]
```

## Parameters

- **completionHandler**: A block to call when the request completes.

The block receives the following parameters:



## Discussion

After this call completes, the [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKLocalPlayer/friends] property of the shared local player object is the same list of players that the completion handler returns.

## Related Documentation

- **friends**: The player identifiers for the local player’s friends.

## Deprecated methods

- **authenticate(completionHandler:)**: Initializes the local player on the device.
- **generateIdentityVerificationSignature(completionHandler:)**: Generates a signature so that a third-party server can authenticate the local player.
- **loadDefaultLeaderboardCategoryID(completionHandler:)**: Loads the category identifier for the local player’s default leaderboard.
- **loadFriendPlayers(completionHandler:)**: Retrieves a list of player identifiers for the local player’s friends.
- **setDefaultLeaderboardCategoryID(_:completionHandler:)**: Sets the category identifier for the local player’s default leaderboard.
